ARABIC: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَٰبٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْعُيُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We place in it gardens of dates and grapes, and cause springs to gush out in it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have laid out gardens of dates and grapes upon it, and made springs of water flow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We made in it gardens of date-palms and vines, and We caused springs to gush forth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and produced therein grains from which they eat and established therein gardens of palms trees and vineyards and have made streams flow therein
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have placed in it gardens of dates and grapes, and We have made springs of water in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have made therein gardens of date palms and grapes, and We have caused springs of water to gush forth therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We make therein gardens of palms and grapevines and We make springs to flow forth in it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We made therein gardens of palms and vines, and therein We caused fountains to gush forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We have placed therein gardens of the date-palm and grapes, and We have caused springs of water to gush forth therein,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have placed in it gardens of date palms and vines, and caused springs to gush [forth] from it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We place therein gardens of the date-palms and vines; and We therein cause to gush forth springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We make in it orchards of date palms and vines, and We cause springs to gush forth in it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We produce therein orchard with date-palms and vines, and We cause springs to gush forth therein:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We have made therein gardens of date-palms and grapes, and We have caused springs of water to gush forth therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And there We made gardens of palms and vines, and in it We caused fountains to gush forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We place in it gardens of palm-trees and vines, and cause springs to gush out of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:34] and We have placed therein gardens, orchards, of date-palms and vines, and We have caused, a number of, springs to gush forth therein,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And We have placed therein) in the earth (gardens of the date-palm and grapes, and We have caused springs of water to gush forth therein) i.e. rivers therein.
